title: Merge pull request #3 from rutsky/filesystems_without_partitions_fix
message:
Merge pull request #3 from rutsky/filesystems_without_partitions_fix

fix handling of filesystems on disks without partitions

title: use matched string for parsing logical ID
message: use matched string for parsing logical ID

title: Merge pull request #4 from rutsky/manual_devices_detection
message:
Merge pull request #4 from rutsky/manual_devices_detection

add button to manually call mBlockDeviceObserver.detectDevices();

title: Merge pull request #2 from rutsky/fmask_dmask_ext4_fix
message:
Merge pull request #2 from rutsky/fmask_dmask_ext4_fix

Use "fmask", "dmask" and "utf8" mount options only on vfat and ntfs filesystems

title: Use "fmask", "dmask" and "utf8" mount options only on vfat and ntfs filesystems
message:
Use "fmask", "dmask" and "utf8" mount options only on vfat and ntfs filesystems

Mounting other filesystems, e.g. ext4, fails with provided "fmask"/"dmask" options
with "Invalid argument" error.

title: fix handling of filesystems on disks without partitions
message:
fix handling of filesystems on disks without partitions

Filesystem can be on whole disk, e.g. on /dev/sda, instead of /dev/sda1.

title: add button to manually call mBlockDeviceObserver.detectDevices();
message:
add button to manually call mBlockDeviceObserver.detectDevices();

This allows to mount devices when FileObserver doesn't work on /dev/
filesystem (e.g. on Android 5.1.1 on Nexus 5).

Also this allows to remount devices when they were manually unmounted.

title: Improved notification. Better service lifecycle. Project reorg.
message: Improved notification. Better service lifecycle. Project reorg.

title: Made arguments more consistent. Require Android 4.2.
message: Made arguments more consistent. Require Android 4.2.

title: Remove boot receiver. Notification receivers for USB get registered
message:
Remove boot receiver. Notification receivers for USB get registered
anyway.

title: Revert "Streamlined, removed activity."
message:
Revert "Streamlined, removed activity."

Broadcast receiver doesn't start after being force stopped.

This reverts commit 826e9015f4e6daf0bf04f0a6754c1aa1c660175a.

title: Add service lifecycle determined by hotplug events.
message: Add service lifecycle determined by hotplug events.

title: Removed crypto stuff for now. Added blkid support and UUID mounting.
message: Removed crypto stuff for now. Added blkid support and UUID mounting.
